description: A pre-field map and document based study
A field based, either non-invasive or low impact, investigation to delimit potential areas of interest.
Site excavation, digging holes in the ground.
A field or office (or both) based investigation with the aim of identifying potential areas of interest and evaluating the importance of an area for future studies and/or preservation.
An investigation using tree rings to determine the age of wood. Sampling includes living, felled, and dead trees.
Project stage irrelevant for this type of project
